description.narrative: Increased participation of children and adolescents in the promotion of child rights with equitable involvement of both boys and girls., which contributes to Environmental Sustainability, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: UNICEF is positioned as a Leading Child Rights Advocate in the humanitarian and development landscape, with adequate funding in support of the country programme.

participating-org.narrative: DEVELOPMENT FUND AND YOUTH AND SPOR ADEN
MINISTRY OF YOUTH AND SPORT SPORTS ACTIVITIES SUPPORTED BY UNIC

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
